text: @GavinNewsom Thank you Governor - Anyone who believes that COVID-19 is NOT real or complains about your RIGHTS - needs to go & donate your "Life & Time" @ a hospital for several weeks. Stay in real quarantine after work everyday like ALL our amazing Medical Heros have for the last months!
